job.title: Software Engineer - New Grad
job.description: anduril is a defense technology company bringing silicon valley talent and funding to the defense sector our technology helps our customers solve their toughest challenges by enabling them to make better more informed decisions in lifeanddeath situations weve assembled a diverse team of experts in artificial intelligence computer vision sensor fusion optics and data analysis that are creating software and hardware solutions to radically evolve the capabilities of the united states and our allies if you are passionate about solving problems that have real impact come join
